maglich *now follow the pattern round 1-10 and make another star you will need 2 stars to make the bag sew all your loose ends after completing the 2 stars when you are ready to sew the stars together make sure you have the wrong sides facing each other to start sewing the pieces together make sure you have your darning needle & a string of yarn that is at least 60 inches long *you may not need this much yarn but i find it s important for the strand to be long enough to sew the entire bag together in one go vs having to sew with multiple strands of yarn sew the bag however you are comfortable i just weave in & out the single_crochet stitches all the way around the star you re going to leave one valley open so from one point to ©2025 ashley maglich point space & this will be the opening of your bag feel free to add a button or any other closure if you d like *i have included instructions for my twisted chain however feel free to make whatever style strap you like best this pattern is very customizable i cannot wait to see what you create with it twisted bag chain leave a decently long tail because you re going to need it when sewing the chain to the bag make a slip knot on your hook & chain 2 single_crochet back into the first chain on your hook twist your work towards you & single_crochet into the side stitch now twist your work away from you & single_crochet into the side stitch continue to twist & single_crochet into that side stitch this creates the twisted chain look i will insert some pictures as well as make a youtube video on how to make this chain you can find my youtube account under my name ashley maglich *continue until the length you want your chain to be there is no right or wrong length or if you prefer a thicker bag strap feel free to make your own my bag strap ended up being around 40 inches when complete feel free to reach out to me with any questions or concerns you may have my email is yourcraftgremlin@yahoo com ©2025 ashley maglich
